content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 units of stone, and my current inventory now includes:
# - Wood: 20
# - Coal: 50
# - Stone: 10
# - Iron Ore: 50

# With enough stone available, I can now proceed to craft stone furnaces. Each stone furnace requires 5 stone, so I can craft up to 2 furnaces with my current stone supply.

# Step 1: Crafting the stone furnaces.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=2)  # Crafting 2 stone furnaces.

# Step 2: Check the updated inventory after crafting.
print(f"Crafted 2 Stone Furnaces. New inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Display the updated inventory.
